subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the most tangible sign yet that the Mets are prioritizing offense over pitching this off-season, the Mets offered Jason Bay a four-year contract Thursday.
snippet: In the most tangible sign yet that the Mets are prioritizing offense over pitching this off-season, the Mets offered Jason Bay a four-year contract Thursday.
